name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of creative writing. It will cover topics such as narrative structure, characterization, dialogue, and setting in writing short stories, poetry, and plays.

name: Intermediate Creative Writing
description: This course builds on the concepts learned in Introduction to Creative Writing. It will cover topics such as plot development, point of view, characterization, and style in writing short stories, poetry, and plays.

name: Advanced Creative Writing
description: This course furthers the concepts learned in Intermediate Creative Writing. It will cover topics such as voice, irony, and symbolism in writing short stories, poetry, and plays.

name: Introduction to Science Writing
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of science writing. It will cover topics such as writing styles, research methods, and data visualization for scientific articles and reports.

name: Intermediate Science Writing
description: This course builds on the concepts learned in Introduction to Science Writing. It will cover topics such as science communication, analysis of scientific data, and ethical considerations in scientific writing.

name: Advanced Science Writing
description: This course furthers the concepts learned in Intermediate Science Writing. It will cover topics such as peer review, ethical considerations, and public engagement in scientific writing.
